name: Hotel Glymur

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The moment you step foot in the Hotel glymur, you are at home. The food is amazing, the views are like something from another planet, truely beautiful. Gods work at it's best. The hotel itself is Cozy, luxurius, friendly and inviting. We had the most wonderful time and didn't want to leave!
reviews.title: There is only one Hotel in Iceland. Forget the rest...

reviews.text: Chesney & Krissy Hawkes
reviews.title: Wonderful relaxing environment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Located in the middle of nowhere on the slopes of a beautiful fjord, this is a real get-away-from-it-all place. The food's great; the hot tubs are perfect for a drink while watching the sunset; and the staff are among the friendliest I've ever come across. Can't recommend it highly enough.
reviews.title: Hot tubs overlooking a fjord by moonlight

reviews.text: Have just started and ended a round-trip of Iceland with friends at the Hotel Glymur. I have stayed there before and was welcomed like an old friend. The food and accommodation were both excellent and the friendly and efficient staff did everything possible to make my stay as comfortable as possible. Having stayed in many hotels and guesthouses in Iceland (this was my 6th trip) I can honestly recommend the Glymur as the best hotel in this wonderful country. Thankyou Hansina and Jon, and hopefully see you again soon
reviews.title: If you stay in only one hotel in Iceland, it has to be hotel Glymur

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staying at Hotel Glymur was a joy. The staff are extremely friendly, and we were treated like family. The dining experience, in particular, was extraordinary. Hotel Glymur's restaurant is run by a second-generation Scandinavian master chef - Mr Helgi - who is one of the best in the world. It is worth travelling to Iceland just for the privilege of enjoying a meal prepared at the hands of this culinary genius.
reviews.title: romantic birthday present

description: Romantic boutique hotel, only 75 min form the airport. Located on a high hillside overviewing the sea. The hotel has 22 mini-suite, spa area, libary, pianobar, conferance facilities and magical surroundings. The hotel has a large art collection and beautiful restaurant. Looking for something different? This is it.
